OrgName.entry: OLDER PEOPLES COMMUNITY MENTAL HEALTH ASSESSMENT AND CARE MANAGEMENT TEAM

Desc.entry: Offers a full social work service and care management service to clients with GPs in the South West NHS Sheffield area whether they are at home or in hospital. Generally, clients of the team will have more complex mental health problems or behaviour which puts themselves or others at risk. Usually they will be aged over 65 years. Services offered include assessment of needs, counselling, help at home on discharge, discharge planning, referral to other social services, advice on welfare benefits and hospital travel costs. Also offers support for carers, liaison with GPs and other health professionals. Self-referral via LA call centre 273 4908, or via LA or health professionals.
